results.name: Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k)^a(k) = 1 + 2x.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3000
N. J. A. Sloane, Weigh transform
formula: Dirichlet convolution of A038063 with characteristic function of powers of 2.
a(n) = 1/n*(-(-2)^n + Sum_{d<n and d divides n} (-1)^(n/d)*d*a(d)). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 06 2002
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
